mapper.select: SELECT id, title, content, writer_id, like_count, created_at, updated_at FROM board WHERE id = #{id} FOR UPDATE

SELECT vbd.id, vbd.writer_nickname, vbd.title, vbd.created_at AS created_date, vbd.like_count, vbd.comment_count, CASE WHEN ls.member_id = #{memberId} THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS is_liked_already_by_me FROM v_board_detail vbd LEFT JOIN like_storage ls ON ls.board_id = vbd.id AND ls.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY vbd.id DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT vbd.id, vbd.writer_nickname, vbd.title, vbd.content, vbd.like_count, CASE WHEN vbd.writer_id = #{memberId} THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS is_my_post, CASE WHEN ls.member_id = #{memberId} THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS is_liked_already_by_me, vbd.created_at AS created_date FROM v_board_detail vbd LEFT JOIN like_storage ls ON ls.board_id = vbd.id AND ls.member_id = #{memberId} WHERE vbd.id = #{boardId}
